title: Donovan
description: No one knows the real Carter Donovan…Tattooed hockey hotness.Mountain of a man.Beast on the ice....And his career is falling apart.Until he meets Sydney Carroway.Famous romance author.Queen of Blue Balls.All Hail the Queen.Carter can’t get enough of Sydney and the sexy games they play.He’s never been more intrigued or turned on by a woman.But when Sydney gets too close to Carter’s secrets, he needs more than a killer glove save to defend his heart.
author: Jillian  Quinn
